channel.title: 2 problems - Help Please
channel.description: 1.) i got my npc to attack but it wont move now ): 2.) i need to make a teleport command, but i dont have a "command" file or folder. help!

item.title: 2 problems - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @zGrEgOrYz zGrEgOrYz
item.description:

the moving and attacking still doesnt work and my tele commands wont work either, i dont even have a commmands file or folder

item.title: 2 problems - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“deathschaos9, post:16, topic:341704”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=438104.msg3219821#msg3219821 date=1275083599]
I tested my old code out before you messed with it, and it was perfectly fine.
[/quote]
Really? Looks to me like

if(command.starts(“home”) {
toX = 3246;
toY = 1289;
}

Would throw an error.[/quote]
Exactly; thanks Kyle for backing me on this

item.title: 2 problems - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“pure2ownage, post:10, topic:341704”][quote author=usman555 link=topic=438104.msg3219773#msg3219773 date=1275082177]
to make a teleport command, just put this underneath customCommand in client.java
if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“home”)) {
toX = 3246;
toY = 1289;
}

the bolded parts are the things you must do.
home = teleport command
3246 & 1289 = teleportation coordinates
[/quote]your a fucking fail i’ve now corrected you 2 times today for missing a ) thats why people still get errors from your gay help.
@Topic; fixed it in the quote try again.[/quote]

I tested my old code out before you messed with it, and it was perfectly fine.

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @iamapker iamapker
item.description:
@iamapker wrote:

go to npchandler.java and search for this

public int getDistanceForNpc

then under that should be a bunch of Cases, added your case for example

			case ****:

**** being the npc’s ID Number.

then again in npchandler.java search for

	public boolean npcGetsAnnoyed

and again under that should be a bunch more cases so add yours again in there like this

			case ****:

**** being the npc’s ID Number.

it should make your npc follow people (if they teleport to area and like 5 feet away it will walk to them and attack them) and it should also make npc attack. goodluck

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

to make a teleport command, just put this underneath customCommand in client.java
if(command.startsWith(“home”) {
toX = 3246;
toY = 1289;
}

the bolded parts are the things you must do.
home = teleport command
3246 & 1289 = teleportation coordinates

Read full topic

item.title: 2 problems - Help Please
item.dc:creator: @Layman0 Layman0
item.description:
@Layman0 wrote:

1.Go To Source
2.Config
3.Open Autospwan.CFG

Then Add It Down
spawn = npcid x y 0 2745 5060 2732 5061 1

That Will Make The Npc Move For Sure And Maybe Attack

Read full topic
